text.*:
This is the list of fashion weeks/events/shows held annually or two times a year all around the world. There are five main events in the world: the London Fashion Week, Milan Fashion Week, New York Fashion Week, Paris Fashion Week and Arab Fashion Week. [1][2][3]. Among the most popular fashion weeks is also Vancouver Fashion Week, Russia Fashion Week.[4][5][6] While the fashion scene turns more multipolar in the 21st century, other centers like Berlin, Los Angeles, Madrid, Rome, São Paulo, Shanghai and Tokyo host important fashion weeks and other events.[7]


The list is ordered by continent and country-wise.
